t.p: Thank you very much for your interest in Compassion's work to free more children from poverty every day, for a dignified and meaningful life.
Protecting the children we serve is one of our priorities. Compassion regulations guarantee that all measures are taken to ensure the safety of Compassion's sponsored children.

p.b: In this perspective, we thank you to complete the following tasks:

t.div: * We accept photos or scanned documents. In case you are not equipped with a camera, a smartphone or a scanner, you can send us the documents at Compassion Switzerland, Rue Galil√©e 3, 1400 Yverdon-les-Bains.
Don't you have all the documents at hand? You can proceed step by step and save the items already collected. Once everything is ready, you will receive an e-mail confirmation.

template.p: To make your trip enriching and an unforgettable experience, please read and validate this visit contract. It has been established to protect your interests, those of children, their families, and partner churches of Compassion.

ul.li: The photos I will take of my sponsored child, his or her family and community, are for my personal and private use only. I undertake not to distribute them on the Internet, social networks or other documents (except as part of Compassion or with its consent).
The costs of my trip (round trip, plus accommodation on site during my stay) are at my expense.
If I visit my sponsored child, I agree to reimburse the COMPASSION National Office for the costs of this visit.
All gifts I give to my sponsored child or his or her family will be in accordance with Compassion's policy on this subject.

I am aware that it is important to show respect for the staff members, children, families and communities or churches I will meet. I undertake to take into consideration the cultural sensitivities of the country I am visiting.
I am aware that the child I am sponsoring has legitimate parents, family or guardians. I undertake to respect and remain within the limits of the sponsor/sponsee relationship with this child.
In case of cancellation of my participation (as a participant), I take note that the payment of the deposit is non-refundable.

In addition, I undertake to pay 50% of the travel expenses if I cancel my participation less than 30 days before the departure date of the trip as well as the totality of the plane ticket (if I ordered the plane ticket through Compassion). It is up to me to contact my personal travel cancellation insurance if necessary.

div.label: I accept the terms of the travel agreement
